tool.name: Genome Mapper
tool.description: Maps genomes into SVG files, similar to DNA Master
tool.command:
bin/cpt_genome_mapper.pl --galaxy --outfile_supporting $__new_file_path__ --file "${file}"
#if $double_line_for_overlap: --double_line_for_overlap #end if
--justification "${justification}"
#if $separate_strands: --separate_strands #end if
--view "${view}"
--x_offset "${x_offset}"
--y_offset "${y_offset}"
--opacity "${opacity}"
--rows "${rows}"
--split_factor "${split_factor}"
--width_mode "${width_mode}"
--width_value "${width_value}"
--inter_line_separation "${inter_line_separation}"
#if $label: --label #end if
#if $label_position and $label_position is not "None": --label_position "${label_position}" #end if
#if $label_shrink_mode and $label_shrink_mode is not "None": --label_shrink_mode "${label_shrink_mode}" #end if
#if $label_callouts: --label_callouts #end if
#if $label_from and $label_from is not "None": --label_from "${label_from}" #end if
#if $label_text_source and $label_text_source is not "None": --label_text_source "${label_text_source}" #end if
#for $item in $repeat_label_numeric_features: --label_numeric_features "${item.label_numeric_features}" #end for
#if $label_query and $label_query is not "None": --label_query "${label_query}" #end if
--genome_map "${genome_map}"
--genome_map_files_path "${genome_map.files_path}"
--genome_map_format "SVG"
--genome_map_id "${genome_map.id}"

param.name: file
param.help: Input file
param.label: file

param.help: Use a double line where a section of the genome is plotted twice
param.name: double_line_for_overlap
param.label: double_line_for_overlap

param.name: justification
param.help: How should each strand of the genome be treated when plotting
param.label: justification
param.option: Justify the strands of the genome, just like with text in a word processor
Left align the strands of the genome, the right edges will be uneven

param.help: +/- strand should be plotted on different tracks (artemis style)
param.name: separate_strands
param.label: separate_strands

param.help: This option controls the arrangement of genes in a track
param.label: view
param.name: view
param.option: Alternate genes up/down by reading frame, like Artemis
Alternate each gene up/down, like DNA Master
No alternation. Genes are plotted on the same line

param.name: x_offset
param.label: x_offset
param.help: The border on the X-axes

param.label: y_offset
param.help: The border on the Y-axes
param.name: y_offset

param.label: opacity
param.help: Opacity of the plotted genes
param.name: opacity

param.label: rows
param.help: Number of rows the genome should be split into
param.name: rows

param.label: split_factor
param.help: Factor by which each line overcompensates. If you have a short piece of the genome at the end of your last row, bump this up until each line of the genome is approximately equivalent.
param.name: split_factor
width_mode
param.label: width_mode
param.help: How to size the plot horizontally.
param.option: Dynamically resize based on a zoom factor

param.label: width_value
param.help: Adjusts width of the plot using behaviour dependent on width_mode.
param.name: width_value
inter_line_separation
param.label: inter_line_separation
param.help: Separation between each consecutive plotted row

param.name: label
param.help: Enable Labelling
param.label: label

param.name: label_position
param.help: Label position
param.label: label_position
param.option: Plot labels on top of genomic features

param.help: How should the label be treated if it is too large?
param.label: label_shrink_mode
param.name: label_shrink_mode
param.option: Anything labels which would not fit are not printed
Reduce font size to make it generally proportional to genomic feature size

param.name: label_callouts
param.help: Use callouts if labelling above
param.label: label_callouts

param.help: Where should label text be obtained from?
param.label: label_from
param.name: label_from
param.option: Use a custom query (must specify label_query)
Basic numeric labels, which increase sequentially for selected features (must specify label_numeric_features)

param.name: label_text_source
param.help: Which tag (e.g., note, locus_tag, product) should be used as label text?
param.label: label_text_source

param.name: label_numeric_features
param.help: If you selected to label with numbers, specify this option as many times as needed to select the features you wish to number
param.label: label_numeric_features

param.name: label_query
param.help: If you selected to label from a custom query, specify that here. An example query would be: !contains:"Hypothetical" key:"CDS,tRNA" tag:"locus_tag" which would search all CDSs and tRNAs which have a locus_tag and do not contain the text "Hypothetical"
param.label: label_query
